text: jin logon (ke saron) par tauret ladavaayee gayee hai unhone us (ke baar) ko na uthaaya unakee misaal gadhe kee see hai jis par badee badee kitaaben ladee hon jin logon ne khuda kee aayaton ko jhuthalaaya unakee bhee kya buree misaal hai aur khuda zaalim logon ko manzil makasood tak nahin pahunchaaya karata
